heading: HR00699
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO CONDUCT AN IMMEDIATE ASSESSMENT OF THE TOTAL DAMAGE CAUSED BY THE TAAL VOLCANO ERUPTION, AND TO COME UP WITH A COMPREHENSIVE PLAN CONTAINING THE TOTAL FINANCIAL REQUIREMENTS FOR THE RELIEF, REHABILITATION, AND RESETTLEMENT OF THE AFFECTED COMMUNITIES
status: Pending with the Committee on DISASTER MANAGEMENT since 2020-02-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00699
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO CONDUCT AN IMMEDIATE ASSESSMENT OF THE TOTAL DAMAGE CAUSED BY THE TAAL VOLCANO ERUPTION, AND TO COME UP WITH A COMPREHENSIVE PLAN CONTAINING THE TOTAL FINANCIAL REQUIREMENTS FOR THE RELIEF, REHABILITATION, AND RESETTLEMENT OF THE AFFECTED COMMUNITIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : AGUINALDO, NAEALLA BAINTO
DATE FILED : 2020-02-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DISASTER MANAGEMENT ON 2020-02-18
